name: Tashkent
description: Tashkent is the capital city with modern architecture, wide boulevards, metro art stations and cultural museums.

name: Samarkand
description: Samarkand is famous for its stunning Islamic architecture, Registan square, ancient madrasahs and Silk Road history.

name: Andijan
description: Andijan in the Fergana Valley is known for its lively bazaars, rich local craft traditions and historical sites.

name: Bukhara
description: Bukhara is a well-preserved historic city with many madrasahs, minarets and a charming old town atmosphere.

name: Khiva
description: Khiva is a compact walled city with beautiful, restored monuments and a strong feel of the Silk Road past.
